omopColumns.name: nhs_number
omopColumns.query:
select 
	op.NHSNumber, 
	max(op.CDSActivityDate) as CDSActivityDate, 
	op.CarerSupportIndicator,
	op.GeneratedRecordIdentifier
from omop_staging.sus_OP op
where op.CarerSupportIndicator is not null
	and op.NHSNumber is not null
group by
	op.NHSNumber, 
	op.CarerSupportIndicator,
	op.GeneratedRecordIdentifier;

omopColumns.name: RecordConnectionIdentifier

dataSource.name: GeneratedRecordIdentifier
dataSource.description: CDS specific identifier that binds multiple CDS messages together.

omopColumns.query:
select 
	op.NHSNumber, 
	max(op.CDSActivityDate) as CDSActivityDate, 
	op.CarerSupportIndicator,
	op.GeneratedRecordIdentifier
from omop_staging.sus_OP op
where op.CarerSupportIndicator is not null
	and op.NHSNumber is not null
group by
	op.NHSNumber, 
	op.CarerSupportIndicator,
	op.GeneratedRecordIdentifier;

omopColumns.name: observation_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Constant value set to `4224770`. Social support status

omopColumns.name: observation_type_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Constant value set to `32834`. EHR outpatient note

omopColumns.name: value_as_string

dataSource.name: CarerSupportIndicator
dataSource.description: An indication of whether Carer support is available to the PATIENT at their normal residence.

omopColumns.query:
select 
	op.NHSNumber, 
	max(op.CDSActivityDate) as CDSActivityDate, 
	op.CarerSupportIndicator,
	op.GeneratedRecordIdentifier
from omop_staging.sus_OP op
where op.CarerSupportIndicator is not null
	and op.NHSNumber is not null
group by
	op.NHSNumber, 
	op.CarerSupportIndicator,
	op.GeneratedRecordIdentifier;
